竜田揚: (たつたあげ) - dish of fish or meat flavoured with soy sauce, mirin, etc., coated with starch and then deep-fried
竜田揚げ: (たつたあげ) - dish of fish or meat flavoured with soy sauce, mirin, etc., coated with starch and then deep-fried
竜皮巻: (りゅうひまき) - white fish vinegared and rolled with konbu
竜盤類: (りゅうばんるい) - Saurischia (order of dinosaurs with lizard-like pelvic structures)
竜神: (りゅうじん) - dragon god/dragon king; naga
竜笛: (りょうてき) - dragon flute (medium-pitched bamboo transverse flute with seven-holes)
竜胆: (リンドウ) - gentian (Gentiana scabra var. buergeri); autumn bellflower
竜胆色: (りんどういろ) - gentian blue; salvia blue
竜舌蘭: (リュウゼツラン) - agave/maguey; American aloe/century plant (Agave americana)
竜舎: (りゅうしゃ) - ryusha (spherical or egg-shaped part near the top of a pagoda finial)
竜舟: (りゅうしゅう) - dragon boat (long 22-person canoe used for racing)
竜虎の争い: (りゅうこのあらそい) - well-matched contest; fight between a dragon and a tiger
竜虎相搏つ: (りゅうこあいうつ) - Diamonds cut diamonds
竜蝦: (イセエビ) - spiny lobster (esp. Japanese spiny lobster, Panulirus japonicus)
竜血樹: (リュウケツジュ) - dragon tree (Dracaena draco)
竜頭: (りゅうず) - crown (of a watch)/stem; cannon (of a bell)
竜頭蛇尾: (りゅうとうだび) - (yoji) a strong beginning and a weak ending; an anticlimax
竜骨座: (りゅうこつざ) - Carina (constellation); the Keel
竜骨弁: (りゅうこつべん) - keel petal (type of flower)
竜骨突起: (りゅうこつとっき) - keel (bird bone); carina
竟に: (ついに) - finally/at last; (with a verb in negative form) in the end
竟わる: (おわる) - (also written 了る, 卒る, etc.) to finish; to end; to close
章を改める: (しょうをあらためる) - to begin a new chapter
章句: (しょうく) - chapter and verse; paragraph; passage
章程: (しょうてい) - law; rule; ordinance; charter
章節: (しょうせつ) - chapters and sections; chapter and verse
竣功式: (しゅんこうしき) - ceremony to mark completion
竣工式: (しゅんこうしき) - ceremony to mark completion
童僕: (どうぼく) - young male servant; page
童唄: (わらべうた) - children's song; nursery song
童心: (どうしん) - child's mind; childlike innocence; naivete
童歌: (わらべうた) - children's song; nursery song
童男: (どうなん) - little boy; young boy
童画: (どうが) - pictures drawn by child; pictures for children
童話作家: (どうわさっか) - writer of stories for children
童話劇: (どうわげき) - play or production for children
童貞: (doutei) - virginity (of a male), virgin; (Católico) nun, sister
童貞喪失: (どうていそうしつ) - losing one's virginity
童貞説: (どうていせつ) - immaculate conception; virgin birth; tradition that Jesus was born to Mary although she was a virgin
童部: (わらわべ) - child/children; child servant/temple page; my (young or child-like) wife; young slacker (who has not yet attained adulthood)
竦み上がる: (すくみあがる) - to cringe with fear; to cower with fright; to be terribly afraid
竦む: (すくむ) - to freeze (from fear, etc.)/to be unable to move (e.g. from surprise)/to be paralyzed (with horror, etc.); to cower/to shrink in on oneself
竦める: (すくめる) - to shrug (shoulders); to duck (head); to draw back (body)
竦林檎貝: (スクミリンゴガイ) - channeled apple snail (Pomacea canaliculata); golden apple snail
竪坑: (たてこう) - shaft (e.g. in a mine); pit
竪堀: (たてぼり) - ascending trench or pathway cut into a naturally-occurring slope
竪格子: (たてごうし) - vertical bars; vertical lattice
竪框: (たてがまち) - stile; vertical frame element on the left or right of a door or window
竪樋: (たてどい) - downpipe; drainspout; water pipe
竪琴海豹: (タテゴトアザラシ) - harp seal (Phoca groenlandica)
竪畝織: (たてうねおり) - warp rib weave (cloth)
竪穴住居: (たてあなじゅうきょ) - pit dwelling; dugout
竪穴式住居: (たてあなしきじゅうきょ) - pit dwelling; dugout
竪笛: (たてぶえ) - end-blown flute (esp. the recorder)
竪縞: (たてじま) - vertical stripes; striped fabric
竭きる: (つきる) - to be used up; to be run out; to be exhausted; to be consumed; to come to an end
端: (bronzeado/hashi/ha/hata) - edge , end (e.g. of street), tip, point, edge, margin; beginning, start, first; odds and ends, scrap, odd bit, least
端々: (はしばし) - odds and ends; all; every
端から: (はなから) - from the start; from the beginning; from the outset
端から端まで: (はしからはしまで) - from one end to another; thoroughly; completely; utterly
端くれ: (はしくれ) - scrap/piece/fag end; (often refers humbly to oneself) unimportant person
端た: (はした) - fraction/odd sum; loose change; low class female servant
端たない: (はしたない) - improper; immodest; disgraceful; shameful; vulgar; low
端た金: (はしたがね) - odd money; loose change; small (paltry) sum (of money); chicken feed; (mere) pittance
端ない: (はしたない) - improper; immodest; disgraceful; shameful; vulgar; low
端を発する: (たんをはっする) - (often 〜に端を発する) to originate with; to start with; to stem from
端を開く: (たんをひらく) - to provide impetus
